snippet.title: Vectronom Announcement Teaser 2019
snippet.description:
In Vectronom, players must memorize patterns and solve environment-specific riddles while moving their hopping cube to the beat. Obstacles change in sync with music as this colorful madness gets harder from level to level, challenging the player’s three-dimensional thinking. With the option of hooking up alternate controllers such as dance pads, Vectronom might even get you moving more than your fingers and brain cells.

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/925460/Vectronom/

Twitter: https://twitter.com/ludopium
Facebook: http://facebook.com/ludopium
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/ludopium/

Directed and Edited by Pedro Lacerda-Talarico
Director of Photography: Jannis Danikas
Production Designer & Composer: Juan Orjuela
1st Assistant Director: Marsha Courneya
Production Manager: Utz Stauder

Teaser produced by Perausfilm & Ludopium

2019 © Ludopium / ARTE France
Nintendo Switch is a trademark of Nintendo. © 2019 Nintendo
